required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of 177Lu-Dotatate PRRT in Metastatic GEP-NEN Patients
clinical_study.official_title: Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of 177Lu-Dotatate PRRT in Metastatic GEP-NEN Patients

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of the study is to evaluate efficacy and safety of Peptide Receptor Radionuclide Therapy (PRRT) with 177Lu-Dotatate in patients with inoperable, progressive, somatostatin receptor-positive (SSTR+), neuroendocrine tumours of GEP-NEN

primary_outcome.time_frame: From date of first dose until the date of first documented progression or date of death from any cause, whichever came first, assessed up to 24 months
primary_outcome.description: CT/MRI will be performed every 8 weeks for efficacy evaluation by RECIST 1.1 and CHOI

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of Treatment-related Adverse Events（Safety and Tolerability）
primary_outcome.time_frame: From date of first dose until the date of first documented progression or date of death from any cause, whichever came first, assessed up to 24 months
primary_outcome.description: Number of participants with treatment-related adverse events as assessed by CTCAE v4.0

secondary_outcome.time_frame: baseline, every 8 weeks up to 1 year after last patient first treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Progression-free survival is defined as the time from the date of first dose to the date of the first documented radiological progression or death due to any cause

arm_group.description: 177Lu-Dotatate A maximum of 8 cycles of 1000mCi 177Lu-Dotatate, each. Route of administration: Slow intravenous infusion/injection (i.v.) Duration of treatment: 8 cycles, every 8 weeks

intervention.description: PRRT using 177Lu-Dotatate 100-150mCi will be performed 8-weekly. A maximum of 8 cycles will be administered. Other: Amino-Acid Solution The Amino-Acid Solution (AAS) to be used in this study, infused over 4-6 h, starting 30 min before PRRT

responsible_party.investigator_title: MD, Professor, Chief of Department of GI Oncology, Peking University Cancer Hospital
